abstract: The Casablanca Capital nominations come just days after Carl C. Icahn introduced his own three-person slate for the software company’s board of directors.
snippet: The Casablanca Capital nominations come just days after Carl C. Icahn introduced his own three-person slate for the software company’s board of directors.
lead_paragraph: Casablanca Capital, an activist hedge fund, on Monday put forward a slate of three nominees  for the board of Mentor Graphics, as it presses for change at the software company.

headline.main: Casablanca Names 3 Candidates for Mentor Graphics Board

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
